value.title: Fuzzy match / merging in Power BI Desktop (October 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, we look at the new fuzzy match / merging option within the October 2018 version of Power BI Desktop. This feature is incredibly powerful when it comes to data matching and can be adjusted to meet your needs.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: How do I get my Excel users to use Power BI???
value.excerpt: Lots of people use Excel and love it! But what about Power BI? Why not use both together? Patrick looks at how Excel users can take advantage of Power BI and may just start using that!  Start in Excel to connect to Power BI datasets https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/collaborate-share/service-connect-excel-power-bi-datasets

value.title: OData Differences within Power BI and how to refresh your data!

We will look at one of the limitations to the existing Power BI service and how we can actually use the new Power BI Preview service to refresh data from an OData feed using oAuth

value.title: Power BI Auditing
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at the Power BI Auditing feature that was made available a few weeks ago. I show how to turn it on and how to search. This can be helpful with understanding who is doing what within your organization.  Offical Docs: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/powerbi-admin-auditing/

Patrick shows you why one particular way is not recommended as it will cause trouble. And then show you how you can use DAX within Power BI Desktop to take this to the next level.
